features.title: Features

meta.title: CORIA Features - Sustainable Living Made Easy
meta.description: Discover CORIA's powerful features including barcode scanning, AI recommendations, impact tracking, and smart pantry management for sustainable living.

overview.title: Powerful Features for Sustainable Living
overview.subtitle: Discover how CORIA's comprehensive feature set helps you make conscious consumption choices and track your environmental impact.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Sustainable Journey?
cta.description: Download CORIA today and begin making conscious consumption choices.

cta.title: Experience These Features
cta.description: Download CORIA to access all these powerful sustainability features.

cta.title: Try This Feature
cta.description: Download CORIA to experience this feature and many more.

transparency.title: Transparency & Accuracy
transparency.description: Our scoring methodology is continuously reviewed and updated based on the latest scientific research and industry standards.

environmental-score.description: Our environmental scoring evaluates products across multiple environmental impact factors.
environmental-score.overview: Environmental scores range from 0-10, with higher scores indicating lower environmental impact.
environmental-score.updateFrequency: Updated weekly with new research data
environmental-score.dataProcessing: Environmental data is processed using life cycle assessment (LCA) principles and weighted based on scientific impact studies.

0.description: Greenhouse gas emissions during production, transportation, and disposal

1.description: Water consumption and pollution impact during manufacturing

2.description: Recyclability and sustainability of product packaging

3.description: Carbon emissions from transportation and distribution

4.description: Environmental impact of disposal and end-of-life management

social-impact.description: Social impact scoring evaluates the social responsibility aspects of product manufacturing and distribution.
social-impact.overview: Social scores assess fair labor practices, community impact, and supply chain transparency.
social-impact.updateFrequency: Updated monthly with new certification data
social-impact.dataProcessing: Social data is gathered from certification bodies, NGO reports, and company transparency reports.

0.description: Worker rights, safety standards, and fair wage practices

1.description: Positive or negative impact on local communities

2.description: Transparency in supply chain and sourcing practices

3.description: Compliance with international labor and safety standards

4.description: Contribution to local economic development and job creation

health-rating.description: Health ratings evaluate the nutritional value and health impact of food products.
health-rating.overview: Health scores consider nutritional content, processing level, and additive safety.
health-rating.updateFrequency: Updated as new nutritional research becomes available
health-rating.dataProcessing: Health data combines nutritional databases with latest health research and dietary guidelines.

0.description: Macro and micronutrient content and balance

1.description: Presence and safety of food additives and preservatives

2.description: Level of processing and impact on nutritional value

4.description: Verification of health claims and nutritional benefits

ethical-production.description: Ethical production scores evaluate animal welfare, organic practices, and fair trade compliance.
ethical-production.overview: Ethical scores assess production methods and their alignment with ethical standards.
ethical-production.updateFrequency: Updated quarterly with new certification data
ethical-production.dataProcessing: Ethical data is sourced from certification bodies, audits, and third-party verification systems.

0.description: Animal welfare standards and humane treatment practices

1.description: Organic certification and sustainable farming practices

2.description: Fair trade compliance and ethical sourcing

3.description: Ethical sourcing of raw materials and ingredients

4.description: Corporate social responsibility and ethical business practices

verification.description: All data sources undergo rigorous verification to ensure accuracy and reliability.

accuracy.title: Accuracy Standards

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about CORIA

items.question: What is CORIA and how does it work?
items.answer: CORIA is a sustainable living app that helps you make conscious consumption choices. Simply scan product barcodes to see environmental impact scores, get personalized recommendations for sustainable alternatives, and track your positive impact over time.

items.question: How accurate are the sustainability scores?
items.answer: Our sustainability scores are based on verified data from multiple sources including OpenFoodFacts, environmental databases, and scientific research. We continuously update our methodology and data to ensure accuracy. Our scores achieve 98% data accuracy through rigorous verification processes.

items.question: Is CORIA Premium worth the subscription cost?
items.answer: CORIA Premium offers unlimited scanning, detailed impact reports, advanced analytics, and an ad-free experience for ₺29.99/month. If you scan more than 10 products daily or want deeper insights into your environmental impact, Premium provides significant value. We also offer a 7-day free trial.

items.question: Can I scan products offline?
items.answer: Yes! CORIA works offline for products you've previously scanned. The app caches product data locally, so you can access sustainability information even without an internet connection. New products require an internet connection for the initial scan.

items.question: How do you protect my personal data?
items.answer: We take privacy seriously. Your personal data is encrypted and stored securely. We never sell your data to third parties. You can review our detailed privacy policy and manage your data preferences in the app settings. All data processing complies with GDPR and other privacy regulations.

items.question: How do I cancel my Premium subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your Premium subscription anytime through your app store account (App Store or Google Play). Go to your subscriptions, find CORIA Premium, and select cancel. Your Premium features will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

items.question: Which countries does CORIA support?
items.answer: CORIA currently supports Turkey, with plans to expand to other countries. Our product database includes international products, and the app is available in Turkish, English, German, and French. We're working on expanding to more regions based on user demand.

items.question: What if a product barcode isn't recognized?
items.answer: If a barcode isn't in our database, you can submit it for review. We regularly add new products based on user submissions. Premium users get priority for new product additions. You can also manually search for similar products to get sustainability information.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about CORIA's sustainable living experience.

items.question: Is CORIA free to use?
items.answer: Yes, core scanning and reporting are free. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited scans, deep analytics and exportable reports.

items.question: How reliable is the data?
items.answer: We combine multi-API feeds, brand disclosures, certifications and academic research, referencing every score transparently.

items.question: Which languages does the AI assistant support?
items.answer: Full support in English and Turkish today, with German and French betas on the way.

items.question: How do allergen alerts work?
items.answer: Add allergen profiles once; every scan checks against them and serves risk alerts with safer alternatives.

items.question: How often are ESG scores refreshed?
items.answer: We refresh monthly with new certifications, brand updates and NGO reports, and send instant alerts for critical changes.

items.question: Do you integrate with retailers?
items.answer: We already partner with selected local and global retailers via deep links, with cart sync and delivery partners in progress.

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: All personal data is encrypted, never sold, and processed in line with GDPR and global privacy regulations.

questions.question: How does the 14-day trial work?
questions.answer: When you sign up for Premium, you get free access to all features for 14 days. No credit card required. After the trial ends, you'll automatically switch to the Free plan.

questions.question: What happens after the trial ends?
questions.answer: When the trial ends, you'll automatically switch to the Free plan. Your data is preserved and you'll continue to access basic features. You can upgrade to Premium anytime.

questions.question: How much do I save with the yearly plan?
questions.answer: The yearly plan saves approximately 35% compared to monthly billing. For example, in Turkey you pay ₺649.99/year instead of ₺1,079.88 (₺89.99/month).

questions.question: What is the Family Plan?
questions.answer: The Family Plan allows up to 6 people to use Premium features. Each family member gets their own account with personalized experience and access to all Premium features.

questions.question: What does Lifetime mean?
questions.answer: Lifetime plan provides lifetime access to Premium features with one-time payment. Instead of monthly or yearly subscription, you pay once and get all features permanently.

questions.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to Premium or downgrade to Free at any time. Changes take effect immediately and billing is prorated.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and mobile payment methods through the app store (App Store/Google Play).

questions.question: Is my data safe?
questions.answer: Yes, all your data is encrypted and stored securely. Even if you cancel Premium, your data remains protected and accessible with the Free plan.

hero.title: CORIA Foundation
hero.subtitle: Together We Create Greater Impact
hero.description: CORIA establishes the CORIA Foundation to invest a portion of app revenues in sustainability projects. With a special Solana token to be issued on the Believe platform, we will participate in the blockchain ecosystem and use token fee revenues to fund green energy, veganism, and sustainability projects.
